   Welcome to the Dailies's documentation!
   ================================================================

.. image:: https://github.com/unkokaeru/dailies/actions/workflows/continuous_integration.yml/badge.svg
    :target: https://github.com/unkokaeru/dailies/actions/workflows/continuous_integration.yml
    :alt: Continuous Integration (CI) Tests

A collection of daily games inspired by NYT Games.

Installation
------------

To install dailies, simply run:

.. code-block:: bash

    pip install dailies

Usage
-----

After installation, you can use the package by importing it in your project:

.. code-block:: python

    import dailies

Or, you can run the package as a script:

.. code-block:: bash

    python -m dailies
